modName: Adina The Young Sorceress ( Save Game )
summary:
Adina is a young female ( Nord ) who is a sorcerous meaning her mage skills have been increased :)

This is a save game xD
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Mods Used ( Needed to look like Adina ) : [/size]
[size=4]SG Female Textures : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?
UNP Body i used : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
Apachii SkyHair : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
No more bronze shine : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/?[/size]

[size=6]
Other mods : [/size]
[size=4]SkyUI : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863


[/size][size=6]Story : 
[/size][size=4]Adina is a mage , she forgot how she ended up in Skyrim all she can remember is a slight amount of her skills with Conjuration , Restoration and Illusion,  she feels weak. Adina has all spells ( And shouts , but not unlocked shouts ) in her spell inventory ( Including developer ones , try not to use them , the game might crash ) and she finds a secret power that she is....[/size]

[size=5]
Well you have to find out *_* ... T_T[/size]
author: xElliie1
